explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly investigates the long-term forecasting capabilities of five prominent machine learning models in asset pricing.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves supervised learning as it uses machine learning models to predict asset prices based on historical data.
explanations.regression: The paper focuses on regression tasks, as it involves predicting continuous asset prices.
explanations.support vector machine: The study includes support vector machines as one of the machine learning models evaluated for asset pricing.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is one of the models used in the study.
explanations.decision tree: The study evaluates decision trees as one of the machine learning models for asset pricing.
explanations.neural network: The paper includes neural networks as one of the machine learning models investigated for long-term forecasting in asset pricing.
